title: Science Domain Language Learning Design Using Mobile Social Media

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific terminology and job-related technical vocabulary
context.additional_context: For working professionals, recreating real-world science-based scenarios via VR simulations and strengthening language learning activities using mobile social media platforms (e.g., WeChat, KakaoTalk)

learning_goals: Learners can improve their ability to communicate using scientific terminology on mobile social media by at least 80%
Learners' ability to explain scientific concepts is evaluated through twice-weekly real-time discussions on social media
Learners visualize scientific theories by creating five or more social media content pieces (short videos/infographics)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
